SELECT p.project_code AS projectCode, p.project_name AS projectName, p.update_date AS updateDate, u.user_name AS userName FROM pm_task a RIGHT JOIN pm_project p ON p.project_code = a.project_code LEFT JOIN js_sys_user u ON u.user_code = p.principal_code WHERE p.status = '0' AND p.has_effective = 1
and p.project_code like concat( '%', #{projectCode}, '%')
and p.project_name like concat( '%', #{projectName}, '%')
ORDER BY p.project_code ASC
